msbt.message: Thanks for my birthday present. I love it and I'm gonna take good care of it, and I'll only bite it sometimes. Here's a thank-you gift as a thank-you for your gift!
It made me real happy when you celebrated my birthday! Your present was super neat! I could tell you care about me, . So let me show you how much I care about YOU!
Your present was real cool! Real cool—like snacks in a fridge! Best birthday ever since I was nine! Man, wish I had a birthday tomorrow too... OH! I hope you like my thank-you gift! Check it out!
Thanks for coming to my birthday party. Your present was neat! I got you a gift too. I licked my present. I mean liked, not licked. How do I errse words? OHNO SOmtheign is
Man, my birthday party the other day was a blast thanks to you! I've tried out the present you gave me, and I didn't break it or hurt myself or anything! BEST BIRTHDAY EVER!

That birthday party the other day is my most precious memory now.
Mostly because I ate too much cake and forgot everything else.
